text: Asɨ 1.2 1 Pi 1.2, 2 Pi 1.2 agaŋ nalusaŋ mavɨn lama naludɨ ukaci lamɨdɨ uamalɨ. Lamadaci naludɨ humɨgaŋ agɨlaŋ simɨ pam hɨnibalɨhavi uamalɨ. Simɨ hɨnevɨdaci kulaŋ iamɨgali limu hɨhɨle agɨlasaŋ mavɨn hadi lamɨdɨlaŋ uamalɨ. Haman lɨdalaŋ lusɨŋ haman agɨlaŋ naludɨ hɨvɨ iaka hadi lɨbalɨhavi uamalɨ.
